Text: Brookstonecom Order Number Sfor shopping at Brookstonecom Your order request was received by our order processing department A copy of your order request appears below for your review We suggest you save this email as a receipt for further inquiries If an item you requested is not in stock or if we need additional information you will receive a followup email We hope that you will also take advantage of our order tracking system This system will allow you to track the status of your order request by entering your email address and order number To try it click on the link below ordertracking We hope your shopping experience on our site was a pleasant one If you have any questions please reply to this message or call us at toll free within the US or at our International number Thank you again for shopping at Brookstonecom Brookstonecom Customer Service Order number S Order request date Bill To Carol St Clair Bent Spur Lane Houston TX United States of America Ship To Dorothy Renz St David s Road Wayne PA United States of America The following items were requested Brookstone G Qty Description Massaging Foot Bath and SpaGift Wrapped Price SUBTOTAL Discount Tax Shipping TOTAL
